programme.title: Top Million Dollar Agent
programme.sub-title: S02 : E25 Top Million Dollar Agent
programme.desc: Sofie Kehdi heads back to Belize to help husband and wife team Rachel and Ben size up some resort properties. Along with their investors, Rachel and Ben are looking to purchase a resort on the island of Ambergris Caye that will provide the most bang for their buck. Each with a big personality of their own, it becomes clear this couple is not going to see eye to eye on what they want. Luckily for them, Sofie is a pro at mediating conflicts when it comes to real estate.

programme.title: Top Million Dollar Agent
programme.sub-title: S02 : E26 Top Million Dollar Agent
programme.desc: Sofie Kehdi heads back to Belize to help husband and wife team Rachel and Ben size up some resort properties. Along with their investors, Rachel and Ben are looking to purchase a resort on the island of Ambergris Caye that will provide the most bang for their buck. Each with a big personality of their own, it becomes clear this couple is not going to see eye to eye on what they want. Luckily for them, Sofie is a pro at mediating conflicts when it comes to real estate.

programme.title: Top Million Dollar Agent
programme.sub-title: S03 : E01 Top Million Dollar Agent
programme.desc: Julie and James are looking for a new home to raise their two boys. James is in the tech industry and would love an energy efficient home. Julie has her own dance studio and can't wait to get back to work after giving birth to her second son. Eve and Shawn are the perfect team for the job, especially with Timberworx's cutting edge "Net-Zero" project.

programme.title: Top Million Dollar Agent
programme.sub-title: S03 : E02 Top Million Dollar Agent
programme.desc: Giulia and Scott have recently come into an inheritance and want the house of their dreams. Currently, they live in a modest bungalow in a busy neighbourhood but would prefer to live in a secluded house with a magnificent view. Ideally, Giulia also wants a house that has separate living quarters for her ageing parents.

programme.title: Top Million Dollar Agent
programme.sub-title: S03 : E03 Top Million Dollar Agent
programme.desc: Kevin is a retired, successful businessman. He is a single dad to Shannon and Jennifer. Shannon has been accepted into the Ontario Veterinarian College at the University of Guelph, which is Canada's leading program in veterinary health care. This is the reason they are moving to Guelph. Kevin is happy to live anywhere as long as it has excellent golf courses. Eve will be glad to tell him that Guelph just happens to have 3 of the top ones in Ontario.

programme.title: Top Million Dollar Agent
programme.sub-title: S03 : E04 Top Million Dollar Agent
programme.desc: Laura is on the hunt for a new home for long time clients Marino and Paula. The couple and their three kids would like a spacious house with a country feel to escape their hectic lifestyles. Due to Marino's busy schedule as a producer, he would prefer a house that is all-inclusive and turnkey. Their kids are very active want a pool and the option for horse stables. Laura's going to find them the perfect home.

programme.title: Top Million Dollar Agent
programme.sub-title: S03 : E05 Top Million Dollar Agent
programme.desc: Louise, Jason, and their two children have been living in Europe for the past 10 years, but now they would like to be closer to their family in Canada. Louise absolutely adores the European aesthetic; the sense of luxury conveyed by multi-peaked roof-lines, bay-shaped windows, and decorative stone. She wants a house that allows them the feeling of "living abroad" without leaving the country.

programme.title: Top Million Dollar Agent
programme.sub-title: S03 : E06 Top Million Dollar Agent
programme.desc: Diogo is a dedicated musician working on his new album. He has been debating between moving to Miami or staying in Canada. Toronto is closer to his family and where he feels at home with his music. Danielle will show him some spectacular properties in both cities and see what he decides.

programme.title: Top Million Dollar Agent
programme.sub-title: S03 : E07 Top Million Dollar Agent
programme.desc: Elizabeth and Michael are retired and want to move closer to their kids and grandchildren. They want to downsize from their two-story house into a bungalow. Luckily, Eve knows all about luxury bungalows. Elizabeth loves to exercise and really would like a gym. Michael has a passion for cars and needs at least a three-car garage. Their current house is dated so they would love a house that is turnkey. Eve will do her best to find their forever home.

programme.title: Top Million Dollar Agent
programme.sub-title: S03 : E08 Top Million Dollar Agent
programme.desc: Tomarra and Rob had just married and blended their two families. As a new family, they want to transition to a quiet neighbourhood away from the hustle and bustle of Toronto. Steve is up for the challenge. Rob is a writer and plans to work from home, while Tomarra is a naturopath who would love to have her own studio. Ultimately, they want to start cherishing the real things in life, and that is spending more time with their kids.

programme.title: Top Million Dollar Agent
programme.sub-title: S03 : E09 Top Million Dollar Agent
programme.desc: Darlene and Bruce are in the market for a new home and have enlisted Laura to help them out. Darlene's one request is that they stay close to their current home, where their daughter goes to school. For Bruce, quality construction materials and workmanship are of paramount importance. One thing the entire family agrees on is that the backyard should have a fantastic entertainment space since they spend plenty of time together outdoors and enjoy having guests over.

programme.title: Top Million Dollar Agent
programme.sub-title: S03 : E10 Top Million Dollar Agent
programme.desc: Kathryn and Neil are true urbanites. They love what downtown Toronto has to offer. When Neil found out his company was relocating to Guelph, they weren't thrilled. After five months of long commutes, the Thompson family is ready to take the risk and make a move-with some conditions. The new house has to have a pool and playroom for the kids and a large entertainment area for adults. Eve's challenge is to find them an enticing home that will convince their friends from the city to visit.

programme.title: Top Million Dollar Agent
programme.sub-title: S03 : E11 Top Million Dollar Agent
programme.desc: Ashley and Ali are ready to take their relationship and living situation to the next level. The young entrepreneurs are prepared to move into a house, but the one thing they can't agree on is where to live. Ashley wants an estate home outside the city that has an outdoor pool and beautifully manicured gardens. Ali, on the other hand, insists on being close to his downtown office and walking distance from restaurants and shops.

programme.title: Top Million Dollar Agent
programme.sub-title: S03 : E12 Top Million Dollar Agent
programme.desc: Stephanie is making a big move from BC to Guelph to be closer to her son John and his family. She doesn't want the move to be a hassle and is looking for an accessible, decent-sized home for her grandchildren and visitors from BC. Good sized guest rooms and a large backyard are a must. As she loves to cook, she would also like a new kitchen. Eve will show Stephanie 3 beautiful homes that fit the criteria. Stephanie is going to have a difficult decision.

programme.title: Top Million Dollar Agent
programme.sub-title: S03 : E13 Top Million Dollar Agent
programme.desc: Steve Bailey, Mike Donia and Daryl King review their favourite homes. Steve takes us down memory lane to his 18th century farmhouse, and another home with a stunning infinity pool. Daryl's listings range from King city to Caloden, with helicopter pads and sprawling backyards. Mike brings us back to his fabulous listings in Thailand. He shows us a home made entirely of Bamboo, and billion-dollar property.

programme.title: Top Million Dollar Agent
programme.sub-title: S04 : E01 Top Million Dollar Agent
programme.desc: George is a retired basket ball player, and Mada is an international model. For a man over 7 feet tall, finding the perfect house might be a challenge. Danielle knows high ceilings come in all shapes and sizes, can she find a style they'll like? They also want a pool and a home theatre.

programme.title: Top Million Dollar Agent
programme.sub-title: S04 : E02 Top Million Dollar Agent
programme.desc: Suhail and Niki have busy schedules. He's a marketing director and she's a doctor so she's often on call for a hospital downtown. Can they find a place that can help relieve stress, but also be close enough to downtown for those urgent calls? They want a secluded home with at least 1 acre and magnificent views.

programme.title: Top Million Dollar Agent
programme.sub-title: S04 : E03 Top Million Dollar Agent
programme.desc: Wendy and Daniel are looking to downsize after their kids have moved out, but still want an elegant home. She's a physical therapist and she's a business analyst. They want something that can help them relax at the end of the day, with at least 4 bedrooms and away from the downtown core. Can Lou find them something that fits?

programme.title: Top Million Dollar Agent
programme.sub-title: S04 : E04 Top Million Dollar Agent
programme.desc: Danielle is helping quite a pair, Joseph is a chiropractor and Nadia is an aerospace engineer. They're looking for a home to start a family. Not only that, they want space to host their extended family. Will it be as difficult as rocket science?

programme.title: Top Million Dollar Agent
programme.sub-title: S04 : E05 Top Million Dollar Agent
programme.desc: Janelle and Manuel are young professionals looking for more space. With one child tagging along on the tour already, they need a place for their growing family. They might need to do some renovations, but they want everything to be perfect.

programme.title: Top Million Dollar Agent
programme.sub-title: S04 : E06 Top Million Dollar Agent
programme.desc: These two business owners Joseph and Heather work hard and want to play hard! They're looking for a place to entertain guests, and Daryl's got some amazing homes to show them.

programme.title: Top Million Dollar Agent
programme.sub-title: S05 : E01 Top Million Dollar Agent
programme.desc: Vipin's family of four are in the market to purchase their own dream home in the Greater Toronto Area.

programme.title: Top Million Dollar Agent
programme.sub-title: S05 : E02 Top Million Dollar Agent
programme.desc: Phil and Aubree, a newly wed couple, are in the market to purchase a dream home in Castlemore.

programme.title: Top Million Dollar Agent
programme.sub-title: S02 : E01 Top Million Dollar Agent
programme.desc: The King is back, baby! Daryl King is known to make an entrance, and he wants the houses he shows to have that same "wow" factor. His clients are looking for a grand mansion, and with their sizeable budget won't settle for anything less than spectacular.

programme.title: Top Million Dollar Agent
programme.sub-title: S02 : E02 Top Million Dollar Agent
programme.desc: Will Daryl be able to dazzle his clients and find a property that will take their breath away? This episode features the first two of four properties, with a special guest appearance by Design Generation builder and designer Carlo Rinomato.

programme.title: Top Million Dollar Agent
programme.sub-title: S02 : E03 Top Million Dollar Agent
programme.desc: International luxury realtor Mike Donia jets off to Thailand to work with a client and good friend of his, Mae. She is moving back to her hometown of Bangkok to pursue her modeling career, and is looking for the house of her dreams. Mike has his work cut out for him, as Mae's long wish list will be hard to achieve with her budget.

programme.title: Top Million Dollar Agent
programme.sub-title: S02 : E04 Top Million Dollar Agent
programme.desc: With the help of a Bangkok real estate expert, Max Gloeckner, Mike is confident he can deliver just what Mae is looking for. This episode features the last two of four properties, as well as the reveal of which house the client decides to purchase.

programme.title: Top Million Dollar Agent
programme.sub-title: S02 : E05 Top Million Dollar Agent
programme.desc: Vicky is searching for a home in The Beaches for her and her family. No one knows the Beach like Inez Kudryk, so Vicky enlists her help in finding some stunning luxury properties to tour. With a grand budget and very particular tastes, Inez knows that Vicky will be a tough client to please.

programme.title: Top Million Dollar Agent
programme.sub-title: S02 : E06 Top Million Dollar Agent
programme.desc: Will Vicky find the forever home of her dreams? This episode features the last two of four properties, as well as the reveal of which house the clients decide to purchase and special appearances by guest agent Jasmine Xuereb and mortgage broker Paul Meredith.

programme.title: Top Million Dollar Agent
programme.sub-title: S02 : E07 Top Million Dollar Agent
programme.desc: Steve Bailey to save the day! This week's episode features the lovely couple Chris and Rosa as they search for the perfect home. While Rosa is mainly concerned with cutting down her commute, Chris just wants to feel a connection to a property. Luckily for Steve, he's got his sister Helen, an interior designer and home stager, to help sway Chris - and it works!

programme.title: Top Million Dollar Agent
programme.sub-title: S02 : E08 Top Million Dollar Agent
programme.desc: Unfortunately for Rosa, she isn't seeing the benefits of moving to a town around Cambridge. Steve's got some neat ideas, but will they be able to convince Rosa? This episode features the last two of four properties, as well as the reveal of which house the clients decide to purchase.

programme.title: Top Million Dollar Agent
programme.sub-title: S02 : E09 Top Million Dollar Agent
programme.desc: Sofie Kehdi heads to the island of Ambergris Caye, Belize to help a friend and former client, actress and choreographer Zuzana Marosová. As a public figure, Zuzana craves privacy in her personal time and is looking for a relaxing space to unwind with her children.

programme.title: Top Million Dollar Agent
programme.sub-title: S02 : E10 Top Million Dollar Agent
programme.desc: With the help of local realtor Daniel Hartin, Sofie sets her sights on the perfect home...and hopefully a bit of fun in the sun! This episode features the last two of four properties, as well as the reveal of which house the client decides to purchase.

programme.title: Top Million Dollar Agent
programme.sub-title: S02 : E11 Top Million Dollar Agent
programme.desc: Jessica and Mark are a young couple living and working in Thailand after meeting there several years ago and falling in love. They are looking for a permanent home in Bangkok, and after chatting with her friend Mae, Jessica knows that Mike Donia is the man for the job.

programme.title: Top Million Dollar Agent
programme.sub-title: S02 : E12 Top Million Dollar Agent
programme.desc: With the help of local agents Max Gloeckner and Nala Gill, will Mike be able to find a place that suits the whole family? This episode features the last two of four properties, as well as the reveal of which house the clients decide to purchase.

programme.title: Easy Cheesy Number 1s

programme.title: The Weekend Hitlist
programme.desc: Every track a smash hit in the 90s or 00s, every video a UK chart number one. What more do you need for your weekend?

programme.title: It Spent HOW Long At No.1 ?!
programme.sub-title: S01 : E01 It Spent HOW Long At No.1 ?!
programme.desc: Once these tracks made it to the top spot there was no knocking them off! The 50 longest chart toppers of the 00s - every song spent at least 3 weeks at the summit.

programme.title: Non-Stop No.1s!
programme.desc: Every track a smash hit in the 90s or 00s, every video a UK chart number one. What more could you possibly need in life?

programme.title: 20 Million Sellers of the 90s!
programme.sub-title: S01 : E01 20 Million Sellers of the 90s!
programme.desc: From Elton & Aqua to Celine & Cher - these all sold over a million in the 90s! But only one sold over 2 million - can you guess?

programme.title: The Weekend Pop Party!
programme.sub-title: S01 : E01 The Weekend Pop Party!
programme.desc: The biggest party songs & sing-out-loud anthems from the 90s & 00s to provide the perfect soundtrack to your weekend!

programme.title: Mariah Carey: Power Diva
programme.sub-title: S01 : E01 Mariah Carey: Power Diva
programme.desc: Starting in 1990, two hours of powerhouse ballads, legendary love songs & pure emotion that can only be delivered by a musical queen. This is the incredible Mariah Carey!

programme.title: All Loved Up! Top 30
programme.sub-title: S01 : E01 All Loved Up! Top 30
programme.desc: Pat Sharp with 30 massive love songs of the 90s - including a bucket load of million sellers and the odd surprise!

programme.title: The Saturday Karaoke Party!
programme.sub-title: S01 : E01 The Saturday Karaoke Party!
programme.desc: Rounding off your week with a good sing-a-long - 50 of the biggest karaoke belters of the 90s & 00s. Turn it up load and sing your heart out!

programme.title: All Loved Up! Top 30
programme.sub-title: S01 : E01 All Loved Up! Top 30
programme.desc: Pat Sharp with 30 massive love songs of the 90s - including a bucket load of million sellers and the odd surprise!

programme.title: Dreamlovers!
programme.desc: Who were your "Dreamlovers" of the 90s and 00s? These are songs that made the soundtrack to young love!

programme.title: Love In A Single Word! 1990-1999
programme.sub-title: S01 : E01 Love In A Single Word! 1990-1999
programme.desc: Classic love & bittersweet 90s classics, all summed up in a single word title - As, Amazed, Pray, Crying, Lifted, Anything, Dreams, Wonderwall & more.

programme.title: Mellow Moments!
programme.desc: Kick back and relax with some mellow moments. Chilled to perfection.

programme.title: The Euro-Pop Party: Top 40
programme.sub-title: S01 : E01 The Euro-Pop Party: Top 40
programme.desc: Anthems & cheesy tunes from the bars, clubs & pool parties of Mediterranean holidays gone by! Expect Whigfield, Ace Of Base & many more that you enjoyed in the sun!

programme.title: You Know The Tune But Who Sang It?
programme.sub-title: S01 : E01 You Know The Tune But Who Sang It?
programme.desc: All famous, sing-a-long hit songs but who the hell sang them? We guarantee you won't know most of these artists by name but you'll love their songs!

programme.title: Mellow Moments!
programme.desc: Kick back and relax with some mellow moments. Chilled to perfection.

programme.title: Mark Goodier's No.2s of 1996
programme.sub-title: S01 : E01 Mark Goodier's No.2s of 1996
programme.desc: 60 minutes of back to back runners up from 1996 - from The Bluetones to Toni Braxton via Robbie, George & Gabrielle. With Mr Charts himself - Mark Goodier.

programme.title: The 1996 Video Hall of Fame
programme.sub-title: S01 : E01 The 1996 Video Hall of Fame
programme.desc: Radio 1 & Top of the Pops legend Gary Davies with the iconic images & award winning clips that set the style of 1996. Including 2Pac, Foo Fighters, Jamiroquai & Alanis Morissette.

programme.title: The 1996 POWER Hour!
programme.desc: 60 minutes of power pop & rock! Earplugs at the ready as we rewind to 1996 with Sheryl Crow, Smashing Pumpkins, Joan Osbourne & Reef.

programme.title: 1996: The Best Sellers!
programme.desc: A complete rundown of the 30 biggest selling singles in the UK for 1996, including 3 from the Spice Girls!

programme.title: All Day - It's 1996!
programme.desc: All day long we are back in 1996! From chart-toppers to forgotten favourites, movie soundtracks to the headlines that made the year!

programme.title: Every Song From NOW 35 - 1996
programme.sub-title: S01 : E01 Every Song From NOW 35 - 1996
programme.desc: Christmas 1996 gave us the 35th release in the NOW series. Here are all 39 videos from CD1 & CD2, back to back & in order! Expect East 17, Faithless & a bit of Garbage!

programme.title: All Day - It's 1996!
programme.desc: All day long we are back in 1996! From chart-toppers to forgotten favourites, movie soundtracks to the headlines that made the year!

programme.desc: Some of our favourite creatures featured in 80s pop videos. Some are cute, some not so! Spot the camels, horses, elephants, owl, donkeys... and cats!

programme.title: 1985's One-Hit-Wonders! Top 10
programme.desc: 10 artists that had a single big song in 1985 - then never darkened the UK Top 20 ever again! Remember Maria Vidal, Arcadia, John Parr & Phyllis Nelson?

programme.title: 1985 Unleashed!
programme.desc: Dramatic storylines, big dance routines, neon lights & iconic fashions - these are the classic music videos that made 1985!

programme.title: Awww! Cute Animals in Music Vids
programme.sub-title: S01 : E01 Awww! Cute Animals in Music Vids
programme.desc: Some of our favourite creatures featured in 80s pop videos. Some are cute, some not so! Spot the camels, horses, elephants, owl, donkeys... and cats!

programme.title: Soft Rock & Power Pop!
programme.sub-title: S01 : E01 Soft Rock & Power Pop!
programme.desc: From the decade that invented the genre - non-stop powerful love songs, back to back.

programme.title: Agony & Ecstasy! Top 30
programme.desc: 30 power ballads - some full of agony and others full of ecstasy. Bliss & sadness back to back.

programme.title: Soft Rock & Power Pop!
programme.sub-title: S01 : E01 Soft Rock & Power Pop!
programme.desc: From the decade that invented the genre - non-stop powerful love songs, back to back.

programme.title: Simon Bates: Our Tune Top 20
programme.sub-title: S01 : E01 Simon Bates: Our Tune Top 20
programme.desc: The soul of every story is in the song. Simon Bates presents the top 20 from across the decades, as chosen by you - each story is unique, each is different.

programme.title: The NOW 100 of the 70s
programme.sub-title: S01 : E01 The NOW 100 of the 70s
programme.desc: Exclusive to NOW 70s, Mark Goodier brings this marathon 100 countdown of the decade's biggest acts, based on global record sales, live concert takings, and awards. So who's no.1?

programme.title: Summer Loving!
programme.desc: Non-stop summer love songs, back to back, from the era of Leo Sayer, Carpenters, The Bee Gees & Minnie Ripperton.

programme.title: Total Legends! 1970-1979
programme.desc: 5 decades on nobody can now dispute the legendary status of this lot! From Frank, Bob & Johnny in 1970 to Olivia, Debbie & Kate at the end of the decade.

programme.title: 1972 Unleashed!
programme.desc: Classic hits from just 1 year - 1972!

programme.title: The Best 1972 Party...Ever!
programme.desc: Blimey, what a year! Get ready to turn your telly up LOUD, with the greatest party anthems from '72 including Bowie, Slade, The Sweet & The Osmonds. Don't forget your Ding-a-Ling!

programme.title: The Best 1979 Party...Ever!
programme.desc: Blimey, what a year! Get ready to turn your telly up LOUD, with the greatest party anthems from '79 including Blondie, Queen, Abba, ELO, Roxy Music, Chic, Squeeze and more!

programme.title: 1979 Unleashed!
programme.desc: Classic hits from just 1 year - 1979!

programme.title: 25 Forgotten Favourites!
programme.desc: 25 videos you'd probably forgotten, some of which you hoped you'd never see again! Standby for Boney M, David Soul, Mary MacGregor, Badfinger & Kate Bush.

programme.title: In The Summertime!
programme.desc: Feelgood sunshine hits from a colourful decade - the 1970s! Flares & mini-skirts at the ready?

programme.title: Bruno Brookes UK Top 40 of the 70s
programme.sub-title: S01 : E01 Bruno Brookes UK Top 40 of the 70s
programme.desc: Including 10 big million sellers back when it was a rare achievement! These are 40 of the biggest selling songs of the decade with Bay City Rollers, Abba, Queen, Blondie & Wings

programme.title: We Will Rock You!
programme.sub-title: S01 : E01 We Will Rock You!
programme.desc: Non-stop 70s rock & guitar anthems! A classic decade for Queen, Status Quo, Led Zepp, Black Sabbath, The Stones & Thin Lizzy.

programme.title: Rick Wakeman's WILD Things!
programme.sub-title: S01 : E01 Rick Wakeman's WILD Things!

programme.title: Ninety Mile Beach: New Zealand

programme.title: Nusa Penida: Indonesia

programme.title: Natural Beauty
programme.desc: Footage of the Diablo Lake.

programme.title: Boarding Pass
programme.sub-title: S01 : E06 Boarding Pass Flam, Norway
programme.desc: Flåm is an idyllic town sitting in a spectacular setting at the head of Aurlandsfjorden. Here, Jamie Lowe takes a train ride filled with breathtaking views along Flåmsbana, the world’s steepest railway line. He also takes a cruise to see the stunning UNESCO-listed fjord, Nærøyfjord, and goes on to experience the cuisine and ways of life of the Vikings in Njardarheimr, a Viking village in nearby Gudvangen.

programme.title: Viajar Peru
programme.desc: As Milagros delves deeper into the heart of the Amazonas, her journey takes a thrilling turn. In search of rare birds, she embarks on a boat ride at dawn. As the day progresses, she meets an indigenous tribe and unlocks ancient hunting secrets with them.

programme.title: Quest
programme.desc: Alex Outhwaite meets the descendants of the royal families of Hyderabad and Lucknow, and they tell her about the culture and cuisine of both kingdoms.

programme.title: World Heritage
programme.desc: In the heritage lanes of the mediterranean island, buried in the depths of time, are the archaeological sites of Cyprus. Be it Khirokitia, one of the most significant Neolithic settlements of Cyprus, Paphos, a mysterious city with Greek influences, or the vibrant splashes in the churches constructed during the Byzantine rule - Cyprus is rich in its heritage.

programme.title: Unwind
programme.sub-title: S01 : E04 Unwind Banyan Tree, Maldives
programme.desc: Indeya unwinds at the Banyan Tree resort. She tries water sports, learns a traditional Maldivian recipe, rejuvenates herself at a spa and ends her day by exploring the capital city of Male.

programme.title: Xp Guide
programme.sub-title: S01 : E23 Xp Guide Oslo 2, Norway
programme.desc: During Elisha’s visit to Oslo, she finds herself in awe of the extraordinary well-designed ships used by the legendary Vikings of Norway.

programme.title: Boarding Pass
programme.sub-title: S01 : E07 Boarding Pass Oslo, Norway
programme.desc: Oslo, the 1000-year-old Norwegian capital, is a compact and fun city that offers the perfect experience of contemporary cultural life in Norway. Here, Jamie Lowe visits iconic attractions such as the Nobel Peace Center, as well as more offbeat attractions such as the miniature bottle gallery and Frogner Park, which features 200 statues created by world-famous sculptor, Gustav Vigeland. He also tries the ski jump at nearby Holmenkollen.

programme.title: Viajar Peru
programme.sub-title: S01 : E01 Viajar Peru Ica Nazca
programme.desc: Milagros’s first stop to showcase her country is at Ica on Peru’s southern coast known for its vineyards and for the desert oasis, Huacachina.

programme.title: Quest
programme.desc: On a journey to find the lost and forgotten recipes of India, Alex finds herself at Asia’s biggest spice market.

programme.title: Backpack
programme.desc: Alexandra, in this episode visits Dubrovnik, where she explores a war museum, the dramatic monuments, mesmerising landscapes and tries water sports.

programme.title: City Breaks
programme.sub-title: S01 : E18 City Breaks Frankfurt, Germany
programme.desc: Frankfurt is the financial capital of the European Union. Kristina discovers that the city has much more to offer than just a good business meeting, as she learns about its history and architecture through its famous sights such as the Kaizerdom Cathedral and the Eltz Castle. She also goes to Rudesheim, where she encounters an amazing collection of data operated music instruments.

programme.title: 10 Days Cyprus
programme.desc: Larnaca in Cyprus is one of the world’s 20 most ancient, continuously inhabited cities for the last 4000 years. Travel enthusiast, Sabrina sets out to find out more about the city but is waylaid when she finds a flock of flamingos at a lake side.

programme.title: Boarding Pass
programme.sub-title: S01 : E01 Boarding Pass North Cape, Norway
programme.desc: Famous journalist and explorer, Jamie Lowe visits the unofficial capital of the Northern Lights in Norway, Alta, where he encounters the two most exciting experiences the place has to offer: he witnesses the Aurora Borealis and he visits the UNESCO-listed Alta Museum with its rock carvings dating back to 7000 years ago. To get the full winter experience, he also tries reindeer sledding, spends a night at Sorrisniva ice hotel, and visits North Cape, the northernmost point of Europe.

programme.title: Viajar Peru
programme.desc: In Arequipa, Milagros has set out to peel back the layers of her country’s history.

programme.title: Quest
programme.desc: From a rich lamb curry to a hearty pulao made with rare mushrooms, Alex learns to make the secret recipes of a local family in Delhi.

programme.title: Backpack
programme.sub-title: S01 : E02 Backpack, Brac and Split Croatia
programme.desc: Stay tuned with Alex to find out what Barc, the coastal town of Croatia, has to offer a backpacker. She tries quad biking.

programme.title: City Breaks
programme.sub-title: S01 : E06 City Breaks Brussels, Belgium
programme.desc: Six hundred years ago, Brussels was just a nice place to stop and buy a waffle on the way to France. Exploring the capital of Belgium today, Catriona realizes that it’s a city where the historic Grand Palace and a hip museum of the world’s oldest and latest cars co-exist. It’s the city where the quirkiness of Mannekin-Pis meets the futuristic approach seen in the Atomium. It’s the city where traditional Belgian chocolates can be savored after a visit to the multicultural Mini Europe park.

programme.title: 10 Days Cyprus
programme.desc: Nicosia, the capital of the Republic of Cyprus is also its cultural heartbeat. Sabrina realizes this, as she sets out to unravel the stories of the largest city in Cyprus while being treated to a bath in a Hammam, which was formerly a church.

programme.title: Boarding Pass
programme.sub-title: S01 : E02 Boarding Pass Tromso, Norway
programme.desc: Jamie Lowe visits Tromsø, the gateway to the Arctic, where he gets to know the Arctic ways of life. He enjoys a reindeer burger, tries his hand at ice fishing, and gets a taste of the culture and cuisine of the Sami, the original inhabitants of the Arctic. He also goes to Bodø, where he witnesses one of the intense whirlpools created by Saltstraumen, one of the fastest tidal currents in the world.

programme.title: Viajar Peru
programme.desc: Amidst the sapphire expanse of Lake Titicaca, Milagros embarks on a journey of reconnecting with her roots. Delving into the secrets of the Uros, she unveils their timeless artistry in building floating islands, a testament to human resilience. But as she travels to Amantani Island, an enigma awaits—a forgotten temple, rituals that date back to the pre-Incan times, chapters of Peru’s lesser-explored history waiting to unfold.

programme.title: Quest
programme.desc: From papad ka paratha to lehsun ki kheer, Chef Aditya Jaimini shows Alex Outhwaite how to make some of the unusual dishes from Indian cuisine.

programme.title: Backpack
programme.sub-title: S01 : E03 Backpack Split and Salona, Croatia
programme.desc: Explore the beautiful Dalmatian coast with a little history of Split with Alex and stay tuned as next she explores the port city of Salona.

programme.title: Great World Hotels
programme.sub-title: S01 : E02 Great World Hotels Closenberg, Sri Lanka
programme.desc: Great World Hotels Closenberg, Sri Lanka

programme.title: 10 Days Cyprus
programme.desc: In the Troodos ranges of Cyprus, Sabrina Chakici visits the Kykkos Monastery and the ten small village churches, which have become a UNESCO World Heritage Site. She further ventures out to explore the Neolithic village of Khirokitia and learn about the age-old lace tradition in Lefkara village.

programme.title: Boarding Pass
programme.sub-title: S01 : E03 Boarding Pass Polar Park, Norway
programme.desc: The world’s northernmost animal park, the Polar Park in Bardu, nearby Tromsø, is home to many of Norway’s predators, and Jamie Lowe sees a few of them such as the lynx and the bear, but the most exciting experience he has is getting up, close and personal with wolves at the park. He also tries husky sledding.

programme.title: Viajar Peru
programme.desc: Milagros visits the ancient city of Cusco just in time for the legendary Inti Raymi Festival, a gateway to the Inca empire's beliefs. Hidden in the vibrant festivities, which continue into the night, are glimpses into the lives led by the people during the Inca era.

programme.title: Quest
programme.desc: Amritsar,where recipes have been passed down generations. Alex explores it in Quest.

programme.title: Backpack
programme.desc: Watch a musical instrument powered by sea waves and learn how glassware was made in Roman era. This and more with Alexandra in Zadar episode

programme.title: Great World Hotels
programme.sub-title: S01 : E11 Great World Hotels Le Telfair Heritage, Mauritius
programme.desc: An invigorating body massage, fresh seafood with rum, kayaking - Freishia enjoys finding out the ways in which Mauritius pampers its visitors.

programme.title: 10 Days Cyprus
programme.desc: Lying next to the island's beautiful Mediterranean coastline, in south-western Cyprus, the popular town of Paphos is home to some spectacular archaeological attractions and a rich Cypriot history. Here, Sabrina discovers the myths of the Greek and Roman philosophies, unravels the stories hidden in time at Paphos Archaeological Park, and explores the historic towns of Limassol and Kourion.

programme.title: Boarding Pass
programme.sub-title: S01 : E04 Boarding Pass Bronnoysund, Norway
programme.desc: The small coastal settlement of Brønnøysund is flanked on one side by an archipelago of islets and on the other by rolling farm country, and Jamie Lowe experiences the best of both worlds during his visit. He goes hiking in Trollfjel Geopark, visits a sea cave and learns about the folklore surrounding the Troll mountains. He also visits a local farmhouse to learn about life in the Norwegian countryside, and goes on to try cod fishing.

programme.title: 10 Days Cyprus
programme.sub-title: S01 : E05 10 Days Cyprus Akamas National Park
programme.desc: From being the primary mode of transport for many centuries to helping in the production of olive oil, the donkeys in Cyprus have truly earned the status of the national animal. Our host, Sabrina Chakici finds out more about them and their significance to the country when she visits a donkey farm. She also visits Akamas Peninsula National Park, one of the island country’s last remaining wildernesses.

programme.title: Backpack
programme.sub-title: S01 : E05 Backpack, Plitvice Lopar and Zagreb Croatia
programme.desc: Alexandra in this episode explores Plitvice, where she visits a national park, interacts with locals, tastes local wine and then leaves for Zagreb.

programme.title: Viajar Peru
programme.sub-title: S01 : E05 Viajar Peru Inca Valley & Machu Picchu
programme.desc: Scaling rocks and defying heights, Milagros finds herself suspended 1200 feet above the ground at the Sacred Valley of the Incas.

programme.title: Boarding Pass
programme.sub-title: S01 : E05 Boarding Pass Roros, Norway
programme.desc: Røros, a historical Norwegian copper mining town full of impeccable wooden buildings, is a place that makes you travel back in time. Jamie Lowe strolls around the quaint town and checks out the mining museum to learn about the town’s fascinating history. Following this, he goes through Lærdal Tunnel, the world’s longest road tunnel, on his way to Flåm. Upon reaching, he goes to the Flåm Railway Museum, where he gets to know the exciting stories behind building the world's steepest railway.

programme.title: World Heritage
programme.desc: From the impact of maritime trade and the European Renaissance on Portugal in the 15th century to the nationwide Romanticism movement in the 19th century, the heritage sites of Portugal such as Jeronimo Monastery and Pena Palace reveal various stages of the country’s evolution.

programme.title: Quest
programme.desc: You won't find anything more comforting than food made from scratch.Join Alex in Hoshiarpur as she finds old cuisines.

programme.desc: Lying next to the island's beautiful Mediterranean coastline, in south-western Cyprus, the popular town of Paphos is home to some spectacular archaeological attractions and a rich Cypriot history. Here, Sabrina discovers the myths of the Greek and Roman philosophies, unravels the stories hidden in time at Paphos Archaeological Park, and explores the historic towns of Limassol and Kourion.

programme.title: Viajar Peru
programme.desc: Milagros visits the ancient city of Cusco just in time for the legendary Inti Raymi Festival, a gateway to the Inca empire's beliefs. Hidden in the vibrant festivities, which continue into the night, are glimpses into the lives led by the people during the Inca era.

programme.title: Boarding Pass
programme.sub-title: S01 : E04 Boarding Pass Bronnoysund, Norway
programme.desc: The small coastal settlement of Brønnøysund is flanked on one side by an archipelago of islets and on the other by rolling farm country, and Jamie Lowe experiences the best of both worlds during his visit. He goes hiking in Trollfjel Geopark, visits a sea cave and learns about the folklore surrounding the Troll mountains. He also visits a local farmhouse to learn about life in the Norwegian countryside, and goes on to try cod fishing.

programme.desc: On a journey to find the lost and forgotten recipes of India, Alex finds herself at Asia’s biggest spice market.

programme.title: Backpack
programme.desc: Alexandra, in this episode visits Dubrovnik, where she explores a war museum, the dramatic monuments, mesmerising landscapes and tries water sports.

programme.title: 10 Days Cyprus
programme.desc: Larnaca in Cyprus is one of the world’s 20 most ancient, continuously inhabited cities for the last 4000 years. Travel enthusiast, Sabrina sets out to find out more about the city but is waylaid when she finds a flock of flamingos at a lake side.

programme.title: Viajar Peru
programme.sub-title: S01 : E01 Viajar Peru Ica Nazca
programme.desc: Milagros’s first stop to showcase her country is at Ica on Peru’s southern coast known for its vineyards and for the desert oasis, Huacachina.

programme.title: Boarding Pass
programme.sub-title: S01 : E01 Boarding Pass North Cape, Norway
programme.desc: Famous journalist and explorer, Jamie Lowe visits the unofficial capital of the Northern Lights in Norway, Alta, where he encounters the two most exciting experiences the place has to offer: he witnesses the Aurora Borealis and he visits the UNESCO-listed Alta Museum with its rock carvings dating back to 7000 years ago. To get the full winter experience, he also tries reindeer sledding, spends a night at Sorrisniva ice hotel, and visits North Cape, the northernmost point of Europe.

programme.title: City Breaks
programme.sub-title: S01 : E18 City Breaks Frankfurt, Germany
programme.desc: Frankfurt is the financial capital of the European Union. Kristina discovers that the city has much more to offer than just a good business meeting, as she learns about its history and architecture through its famous sights such as the Kaizerdom Cathedral and the Eltz Castle. She also goes to Rudesheim, where she encounters an amazing collection of data operated music instruments.

programme.title: Quest
programme.desc: From a rich lamb curry to a hearty pulao made with rare mushrooms, Alex learns to make the secret recipes of a local family in Delhi.

programme.title: Backpack
programme.sub-title: S01 : E02 Backpack, Brac and Split Croatia
programme.desc: Stay tuned with Alex to find out what Barc, the coastal town of Croatia, has to offer a backpacker. She tries quad biking.

programme.title: 10 Days Cyprus
programme.desc: Nicosia, the capital of the Republic of Cyprus is also its cultural heartbeat. Sabrina realizes this, as she sets out to unravel the stories of the largest city in Cyprus while being treated to a bath in a Hammam, which was formerly a church.

programme.title: Viajar Peru
programme.desc: In Arequipa, Milagros has set out to peel back the layers of her country’s history.

programme.title: Boarding Pass
programme.sub-title: S01 : E02 Boarding Pass Tromso, Norway
programme.desc: Jamie Lowe visits Tromsø, the gateway to the Arctic, where he gets to know the Arctic ways of life. He enjoys a reindeer burger, tries his hand at ice fishing, and gets a taste of the culture and cuisine of the Sami, the original inhabitants of the Arctic. He also goes to Bodø, where he witnesses one of the intense whirlpools created by Saltstraumen, one of the fastest tidal currents in the world.

programme.title: City Breaks
programme.sub-title: S01 : E06 City Breaks Brussels, Belgium
programme.desc: Six hundred years ago, Brussels was just a nice place to stop and buy a waffle on the way to France. Exploring the capital of Belgium today, Catriona realizes that it’s a city where the historic Grand Palace and a hip museum of the world’s oldest and latest cars co-exist. It’s the city where the quirkiness of Mannekin-Pis meets the futuristic approach seen in the Atomium. It’s the city where traditional Belgian chocolates can be savored after a visit to the multicultural Mini Europe park.

programme.title: Quest
programme.desc: From papad ka paratha to lehsun ki kheer, Chef Aditya Jaimini shows Alex Outhwaite how to make some of the unusual dishes from Indian cuisine.

programme.title: Backpack
programme.sub-title: S01 : E03 Backpack Split and Salona, Croatia
programme.desc: Explore the beautiful Dalmatian coast with a little history of Split with Alex and stay tuned as next she explores the port city of Salona.

programme.title: 10 Days Cyprus
programme.desc: In the Troodos ranges of Cyprus, Sabrina Chakici visits the Kykkos Monastery and the ten small village churches, which have become a UNESCO World Heritage Site. She further ventures out to explore the Neolithic village of Khirokitia and learn about the age-old lace tradition in Lefkara village.

programme.title: Viajar Peru
programme.desc: Amidst the sapphire expanse of Lake Titicaca, Milagros embarks on a journey of reconnecting with her roots. Delving into the secrets of the Uros, she unveils their timeless artistry in building floating islands, a testament to human resilience. But as she travels to Amantani Island, an enigma awaits—a forgotten temple, rituals that date back to the pre-Incan times, chapters of Peru’s lesser-explored history waiting to unfold.

programme.title: Boarding Pass
programme.sub-title: S01 : E03 Boarding Pass Polar Park, Norway
programme.desc: The world’s northernmost animal park, the Polar Park in Bardu, nearby Tromsø, is home to many of Norway’s predators, and Jamie Lowe sees a few of them such as the lynx and the bear, but the most exciting experience he has is getting up, close and personal with wolves at the park. He also tries husky sledding.

programme.title: World Heritage

programme.title: Viajar Peru

programme.title: Boarding Pass
programme.sub-title: S01 : E07 Boarding Pass Oslo, Norway
programme.desc: Oslo, the 1000-year-old Norwegian capital, is a compact and fun city that offers the perfect experience of contemporary cultural life in Norway. Here, Jamie Lowe visits iconic attractions such as the Nobel Peace Center, as well as more offbeat attractions such as the miniature bottle gallery and Frogner Park, which features 200 statues created by world-famous sculptor, Gustav Vigeland. He also tries the ski jump at nearby Holmenkollen.

programme.title: LINE OF SIGHT | A Look into Wingsuit BASE Jumping
programme.desc: The golden age of wingsuiting is upon us. Through evolving suit technology the initial inflation time has gone down, which has lead to quicker starts and more exits. Wingsuit athletes Marshal Miller, Jesse Hall, and Sean Chuma take you through the iconic jumps.

programme.title: Freeride World Tour 2022 - stop #2 - Ordino Arcalís (AND)
programme.desc: Nach der Eröffnungsveranstaltung in Baqueira Beret (ESP) am vergangenen Wochenende kehrt die Freeride World Tour in das ewige Pyrenäen-Freeride-Mekka Ordino Arcalís, Andorra, zurück!

programme.title: DATEV Challenge Roth 2025
programme.desc: The triathlon in Roth will take place again on July 6, 2025. The sports festival in the triathlon stronghold has been home to triathletes from all over the world since 1984. 3.8 km of swimming, 180 km of cycling and 42.2 km of running through the triathlon district of Roth.

programme.title: DATEV Challenge Roth 2025
programme.desc: The triathlon in Roth will take place again on July 6, 2025. The sports festival in the triathlon stronghold has been home to triathletes from all over the world since 1984. 3.8 km of swimming, 180 km of cycling and 42.2 km of running through the triathlon district of Roth.

programme.title: Desert Dash Namibia 2024
programme.desc: The Desert Dash 2024 is an exhilarating mountain biking event that challenges riders to conquer the breathtaking terrain of the Namib Desert. Spanning over 24 hours, participants embark on a grueling 369-kilometer journey.

programme.title: Cape Epic 2025 - Prologue
programme.desc: The Cape Epic 2025 is one of the world's most important mountain bike stage races in the rugged landscape of South Africa. The event promises intense competition and unforgettable adventures

programme.title: Cape Epic 2025 - Stage 1
programme.desc: The Cape Epic 2025 is one of the world's most important mountain bike stage races in the rugged landscape of South Africa. The event promises intense competition and unforgettable adventures

programme.title: Profile Freeskier Nadine Wallner
programme.desc: Nadine Wallner is a freeskier, climber and mountaineer who has experienced incredible highs and devastating lows on her journey of discovery. She takes part in the Freeride World Tour, the pinnacle of freeriding competition for skiers and snowboarders.

programme.title: GWA Wingfoil World Cup 2024 – Dakhla (MAR) – Overall Highlights
programme.desc: The GWA Wingfoil World Cup 2024 is coming to Dakhla, bringing the best wingfoilers in the world to this Moroccan paradise. With its reliable winds and breathtaking landscapes, Dakhla offers the perfect backdrop for exciting races.

programme.title: WOF 2025 #07: Motosurf World Championship Finals
programme.desc: Welcome to World of Freesports and to the Motosurf World Championship Finals from Macao, China, where the world’s top motosurfers battle for glory against a breathtaking backdrop of speed and precision. Who will conquer and claim the ultimate title?

programme.title: FIA Karting European Championship - Kristianstad (SWE)
programme.desc: FIA Karting European ChampionshipsThis time we are in Sweden to have a look at a rather unusual motorsport event. Almost every motorsport pilot has started his carrer in a Kart. Let´s see how europe´s new pilot generation is doing on the scandinavian course.

programme.title: FIA Karting World Championship KZ / KZ2
programme.desc: The last FIA Karting event of the season will take place in Portugal. The Mondokart.com FIA Karting World Championship - KZ will see the discipline’s top drivers battle it out alongside participants in the FIA Karting World Cup - KZ2 and the Int. Masters Super Cup.

programme.title: FIA Championship Middle East - Saudi Baja Hall
programme.desc: The Saudi Baja is an important event in the FIA Middle East Baja Cup series. It takes place from January 30 to February 1, 2025 and serves as the opening round of the FIA World Cup for Cross-Country Bajas and the FIM Bajas World Cup.

programme.title: Simple Session 2024 - Skate Final
programme.desc: Simple Session was born in 2000, starting as a small-town competition, it has now blossomed into one of the world's largest and most prestigious BMX and skateboarding contests. Simple Session 24 is set on August 24-25, promising a spectacular festival!

programme.title: Cape Epic 2022 - Men
programme.desc: The Absa Cape Epic is the world’s premier mountain bike stage race. The route changes every year, leading aspiring amateur and professional mountain bikers through 650 Untamed kilometres of unspoilt scenery and up 16 000m of climbing.

programme.title: Freeride World Tour - Stop #05 SUI
programme.desc: The final showdown of the Freeride World Tour 2022 is right around the corner and it’ll take place in Verbier, Switzerland between 26th of March and 3rd of April.

programme.title: Natural Selection Tour 2022 - Alaska, USA
programme.desc: The Natural Selection Tour 2022 features the world’s greatest men and women snowboarders competing on the planet’s most epic terrain in all-time conditions. The Tour’s mission is to inspire people to forge a deeper bond with Mother Nature.

programme.title: Cape Epic 2022 - Women
programme.desc: The Absa Cape Epic is the world’s premier mountain bike stage race. The route changes every year, leading aspiring amateur and professional mountain bikers through 650 Untamed kilometres of unspoilt scenery and up 16 000m of climbing.

programme.title: Trans Napoli - A Mountain Bike Expedition Naples (ITA)
programme.desc: TransNapoli is an urban MTB adventure led by legendary mountain bike pioneer Hans Rey. It is a colorful five-day tour that crosses the Amalfi and Naples regions of Italy on mountain bikes and e-bikes.

programme.title: Freeride World Tour 2022 - stop #3 - Kicking Horse (CAN)
programme.desc: The Freeride World Tour has its 3rd stop. This takes place in Canada at Kicking Horse Golden BC, (CAN). It will be exciting to see how the Tour continues after the first two spectacular stopps!

programme.title: Winter Games New Zealand - Back Country Freestyle Challenge
programme.desc: Back to the third episode of the New Zealand Winter Games 2023! This time, we dive into the exhilarating world of Back Country Freestyle, where athletes shows their skills in the untouched winter landscapes in the southern Alps of New Zealand. Get ready for an adrenaline-packed adventure!

programme.title: Gold Coast Marathon 2024
programme.desc: The ASICS Gold Coast Marathon, a World Athletics Label Road Race, is the pinnacle of road running events in Australia and during its history has distinguished itself as one of the most prestigious marathons in the world.

programme.title: Greenlandic
programme.desc: In today´s episode we have the ultimate journey into the heart of Greenland´s rich culture and untamed backcountry. Join us as we explore the breathtaking landcapes of this Artic wonderland. It´s the paradise for every passionate freeskier. Let´s check out!

programme.title: Motosurf World Championship 2024

programme.desc: With over 200 events in 30 countries worldwide the spartan race series is perhaps the leading global brand in obstacle course racing challenging competitors on some of the toughest courses ever devised.

programme.desc: Two adventurous friends, Jeff Shapiro and Cody Tuttle, have a desire to experience one of the last, raw, and truly preserved wilderness areas on the North American continent, attempt to hike and fly paraglider's across the Arctic National Wildlife Refuge in Alaska.

programme.title: GKA Freestyle Kite World Cup - Dunkerque (FRA)

programme.title: Strongman Champions League
programme.sub-title: S06 : E07 SCL 2019 Season 6, Episode 7, Serbia

programme.title: Strongman Champions League
programme.sub-title: S06 : E08 SCL 2019 Season 6, Episode 8, Finland (Part 1)
programme.desc: Mateusz Kieliszkowski from Poland and Aivars Smaukstelis from Latvia are the strongman future of these days. Mateusz is the best man in the World at the moment to defeat. Only 25 years and such a fantastic strongman. They come here only for a win. But there are 12 more Strong athletes in this episode who want the title of Finland as well.

programme.title: Strongman Champions League
programme.sub-title: S06 : E09 SCL 2019 Season 6, Episode 9, Finland (Part 2)
programme.desc: Mateusz Is leading after day 1 (previous episode) with close behind him Aivars Smaukstelis and Zake Muluzi from the UK. All very exciting! 5 events in this episode: Log Lift, Fram Walk, Deadlift, Sack Throw (Weight for Height), Loading medley.

programme.title: Strongman Champions League
programme.sub-title: S06 : E10 SCL 2019 Season 6, Episode 10, Portugal
programme.desc: In this stage we have a new strong debutant: Oleg Sylka from the Ukraine. He is the new talent, who will stand up against the old champions like ZSydrunas Savickas and Brian Shaw and the Stoltman Brother from the UK. This new talent Oleg is a great character and we will see him flame in the episode in Portugal.

programme.title: Strongman Champions League
programme.sub-title: S06 : E11 SCL 2019 Season 6, Episode 11, Callio
programme.desc: In Callio is the deepest mine of Europe/ 1500 meter deep, whereas the MLO Strongman Champions League also did 1 event. The Forward Hold, on a 1500 dept/ also a kind of new record/ as it was never done before. Spectacular and new in Strongman sport.

programme.title: Strongman Champions League
programme.sub-title: S06 : E12 SCL 2019 Season 6, Episode 12, Ukraine
programme.desc: Kelvin de Ruiter is here to defend his SCL World Truck Pull Championships title. But this year, another strong field wants his title. Over 3 different pulls with 3 different trucks, and 14 athletes at the start, it will be difficult for everybody.

programme.title: Strongman Champions League
programme.sub-title: S06 : E13 SCL 2019 Season 6, Episode 13, Caribbean
programme.desc: SCL edition Curacao 2019 was a great event, twelve power boys from all over made a great show at the white beaches, and 35 degrees Celsius heat in the Carrabean Islands. Two events were held on Friday at the beach of beautiful resort Sunscape, the other three were held near the world famous floating bridge at Willemstad on Saturday night.

programme.title: Strongman Champions League
programme.sub-title: S06 : E14 SCL 2019 Season 6, Episode 14, Dubai
programme.desc: Hosted at Meydan Grandstand in Dubai, the Strongman Champions League had some really big names in the list like Mateusz Kieliszkowski from Poland, Brian Shaw from the USA and Krzysztof Radzikowski. In front of the Burj Khalifa the athletes do the deadlift max and 4 other heavy events at another spot in Dubai.

programme.title: Strongman Champions League
programme.sub-title: S06 : E15 SCL 2019 Season 6, Episode 15, World Finals (Part 1)
programme.desc: With new places on the calendar, over 16 stages, broadcasting in over 100 countries and in its 13th year, the MLO Strongman Champions League (SCL) can be seen truly as the biggest strongman league in the world. The last stage over 2 episodes of the MLO Strongman Champions League, were held in Porto, Portugal. This competition in Portugal is full of memorable performances and strong results.

programme.title: Strongman Champions League
programme.sub-title: S06 : E16 SCL 2019 Season 6, Episode 16, World Finals (Part 2)
programme.desc: With new places on the calendar, over 16 stages, broadcasting in over 100 countries and in its 13th year, the MLO Strongman Champions League (SCL) can be seen truly as the biggest strongman league in the world. This competition in Portugal is full of memorable performances and strong results and this is the final!

programme.title: Strongman Champions League
programme.sub-title: S07 : E01 SCL 2021 Season 7, Episode 1, Norway
programme.desc: The spectacular Fefor Arena hosted for the 8th time the Worlds Strongest Viking, part of the SCL World Series. But with the absence of former title holders its anyones game. Again, a very spectacular episode of the Strongman Champions League here in Norway.

programme.title: Strongman Champions League
programme.sub-title: S07 : E02 SCL 2021 Season 7, Episode 2, Finland (Part 1)
programme.desc: In this episode, the Titan, former double World champion from Latvia will compete against his fellow countryman and the current World champion - Aivars Smaukstelis. With 8 events over 2 stages the contestants are pushed to their limits in Finland.

programme.title: Strongman Champions League
programme.sub-title: S07 : E03 SCL 2021 Season 7, Episode 3, Finland (Part 2)
programme.desc: Dainis Zageris and Aivars Smaukstelis, both from Latvia have a serious, strong battle in the this second and final episode of the SCL Finland 2020. Watch the unbelievable and brute power of these athletes in the last 4 events to crown the winner.

programme.title: Strongman Champions League
programme.sub-title: S07 : E04 SCL 2021 Season 7, Episode 4, World Record Breakers
programme.desc: The SCL Germany event takes place in an ancient castle called Die Burg in the heart of Germany. Its here where 5 world record attempts take place across 5 different events with 10 athletes. They will go to the max! See this and much more in the SCL Germany 2020.

programme.title: Strongman Champions League
programme.sub-title: S07 : E05 SCL 2021 Season 7, Episode 5, Strongest Viking
programme.desc: SCL Norway is normally all about snow, wind, and cold weather. Our brave athletes are used to compete under conditions few other athletes have competed in, but after COVID delays the competition has been moved from winter to summer bringing in a whole new range of challenges. With an impressive athlete list who will be the winner across 5 cruel events?

programme.title: Strongman Champions League
programme.sub-title: S07 : E06 SCL 2021 Season 7, Episode 6, World Strongest Team 1
programme.desc: Were in sunny Finland for the next stage of a double-bill of SCL action, but this time its a team event. A truly fantastic event with 6000 spectators. Even during COVID times this was exceptional! 8 Strong Teams where fighting for the title over a crazy 9 events.

programme.title: Strongman Champions League
programme.sub-title: S07 : E07 SCL 2021 Season 7, Episode 7, World Strongest Team 2
programme.desc: Day 2 of the famous Team World championship here in Finland, done over 9 cruel events. In this episode the last and final 5 events take place. 8 Strong Teams are fighting for the title.

programme.title: Strongman Champions League
programme.sub-title: S07 : E08 SCL 2021 Season 7, Episode 8, Portugal
programme.desc: The next set of challenges are set in sunny Esposende in Portugal. With stars such as Travis Ortmayer, Kelvin de Ruiter from Holland, and Ervin Toots from Estonia. While Fabio Silva will defend the honour in his own country.

programme.title: Strongman Champions League
programme.sub-title: S07 : E09 SCL 2021 Season 7, Episode 9, World Records (Part 1)
programme.desc: We are back in Germany, with the world record breakers. We promise you this is going to be amazing. Do not move from that seat, because we are going to see some records smashed today. Over 6 cruel events, you will see who gets crowned of the King Of The Castle!

programme.title: Strongman Champions League
programme.sub-title: S07 : E10 SCL 2021 Season 7, Episode 10, World Records (Part 2)
programme.desc: With the next episode of Strongman Champions League Germany. Its the world record breakers, and in the last show we set two new records. Can more be records be broken before the king of the castle is crowned?

programme.title: Strongman Champions League
programme.sub-title: S07 : E11 SCL 2021 Season 7, Episode 11, Worlds 105 Kg (Part 1)
programme.desc: Welcome to Kokkola in Finland. This city will be the setting for the Lightweight World championship. Out of 24 athletes, only 16 will make it through to the final day, but who will champion each event and who is going to be eliminated?

programme.title: Strongman Champions League
programme.sub-title: S07 : E12 SCL 2021 Season 7, Episode 12, Worlds 105 Kg (Part 2)
programme.desc: Its the second day, and the top 16 athletes have made it through to the final round. With another 4 events to go who will get the crown of world champion?

programme.title: Strongman Champions League
programme.sub-title: S07 : E13 SCL 2021 Season 7, Episode 13, Ukraine
programme.desc: Welcome to Ukraine and the wonderful capital city of Kyiv. Were here for the second time for the iconic truck pull World Championships! The reigning World champion Kelvin de Ruiter from Holland will defend his title.

programme.title: Strongman Champions League
programme.sub-title: S07 : E14 SCL 2021 Season 7, Episode 14, Romania
programme.desc: In this episode, a final chance for our athletes to get vital world series ranking points on board to give them the best possible chance of success and an initial advantage at the finals. It's the last show before the world finals and the top 10 places are up for grabs, but who will they be?

programme.title: Strongman Champions League
programme.sub-title: S07 : E15 SCL 2021 Season 7, Episode 15, World Finals (Part 1)
programme.desc: We are in Alanya, on Turkeys south-coast for the final stop at the end of a mammoth season. Here in the sunshine, well finally crown our world champion and what a place Alanya is - you could not ask for a better setting. Aivars Smaukstellis, the reigning world champion is defending his title, and two-time world champion Dainis Zageris is also here, but with a though competition, who will win?

programme.title: Strongman Champions League
programme.sub-title: S07 : E16 SCL 2021 Season 7, Episode 16, World Finals (Part 2)
programme.desc: What a day ahead of us here in Alanya, just a handful of events to go before we find out who will be the winner of Strongman Champions League in 2021. These are the world finals, and all the big names are in the house. With just 3 events to go - who will take the crown of World Champion 2021 and be the STRONGEST?

programme.title: Strongman Champions League
programme.sub-title: S08 : E01 SCL 2022 Season 8, Episode 1, Finland Stage 1
programme.desc: We are back, after a short break it feels like we never even left. We’re here in Vaasa - Finland kicking off 2022 new world series. If you are watching at home, just like these people, you’re in the right place. Because this is a special edition world record breaker. The only question left today, is to see how many new world records will be set so stay tuned.

programme.title: Strongman Champions League
programme.sub-title: S08 : E02 SCL 2022 Season 8, Episode 2, Holland Part 1
programme.desc: We are here in Doetinchem – Holland, for Stage 2 and 3 in the hottest day of the year. 40-degree heat, these boys have to work harder than they ever have. The sun is going to be beating down, they’re going to be sweating, hydration is going to be key today. I also reckon they’re all going to be wearing their sunglasses. Let’s see which shady looking character wins.

programme.title: Strongman Champions League
programme.sub-title: S08 : E03 SCL 2022 Season 8, Episode 3, Holland Part 2
programme.desc: So there you have it. The next day, 3 more events in 40 Degrees heat. We’ve got Gavin coming into day 2 leading the pack. Kelvin De Ruiter our world champion struggling a little bit at the moment, but Yoke Race, Conan’s Wheel and then Stones to finish. There is a lot to be played for here, so stay tuned to see if Gavin can take the lead and beat Kelvin overall.

programme.title: Strongman Champions League
programme.sub-title: S08 : E04 SCL 2022 Season 8, Episode 4, Serbia Part 1
programme.desc: We’re in the Serbian city of Novi kozarci, for the next stage in the world series. And what a fantastic line up we have for you again. But it is going to be one of the hottest stages yet. A Strongman competition in 44-degree heat. It will be a real challenge for these athletes to finish this event. From all over the world the strongmen came here for the title! Welcome to the heat hell in Serbia.

programme.title: Strongman Champions League
programme.sub-title: S08 : E05 SCL 2022 Season 8, Episode 5, Serbia Part 2
programme.desc: Welcome to day 2 in Serbia, and its another baking hot one. We are in Kikinda today! We’ve got three more gruelling events for our athletes. Sami Ahola is leading the pack, so can he be the first Finnish athlete to take an SCL title. Stay tuned to find out.

programme.title: Strongman Champions League
programme.sub-title: S08 : E06 SCL 2022 Season 8, Episode 6, Joensuu Part 1
programme.desc: In this competition, we have our athletes paired up. They’re going to have to take on each event together, having to factor in each other’s strengths and possibly weaknesses. Can the men who normally work alone, share their powers as a duo? Let’s find out!

programme.title: Strongman Champions League
programme.sub-title: S08 : E07 SCL 2022 Season 8, Episode 7, Joensuu Part 2
programme.desc: Day 2 of the famous Team World championship here in Finland- Joensuu. Welcome to the final day of the world’s strongest team event. The race to be the best team in the world is coming to its crowing point. All is still wide open for any of these to take the title. Who is going to win? Will team Latvia keep their World Title or maybe Finland can attach them? Keep watching and we’ll find out.

programme.title: Strongman Champions League
programme.sub-title: S08 : E08 SCL 2022 Season 8, Episode 8, Esposende
programme.desc: Welcome back to Strongman Champions League for another stage of the 2022 world tour. We’re in Esposende - Portugal in this beautiful setting next to the beach in front of a packed crowd with some of the strongest men the world has to offer. With a real Porsche deadlift and many other crazy stuff. So, lets get this show started.

programme.title: Strongman Champions League
programme.sub-title: S08 : E09 SCL 2022 Season 8, Episode 9, Great Britain
programme.desc: Hello and welcome in Gloucester, UK. The world tour hasn’t been here for what feels like forever. And now for the first time in the Mekka of Strongman, the SCL World series will crown a great Champion with the SCL Title. It will be full with special wooden events, and a great winner! So ladies and gentleman, boys and girls, brace yourselves because I present to you strongman champions league UK.

programme.title: Strongman Champions League
programme.sub-title: S08 : E10 SCL 2022 Season 8, Episode 10, Poland Part 1
programme.desc: We are in Sopot, Poland the home of Legends Mariusz Pudzianowkski and Krzystof Radzikowski. Who will grab the title here in holiday resort Sopot, on the great Balrtic Sea with 6 events and 12 athlets in the mix!

programme.title: Strongman Champions League
programme.sub-title: S08 : E11 SCL 2022 Season 8, Episode 11, Poland Part 2
programme.desc: We are in Sopot, Poland, after 3 events the Polish Strongman Oskar Ziolkowski is Leading. Kelvin, Travis and Aivars are coming up and will try to beat him, but will Oskar take his first title ever?

programme.title: Strongman Champions League
programme.sub-title: S08 : E12 SCL 2022 Season 8, Episode 12, Bosnia
programme.desc: it’s been a long time since the world series held a championship here in Sarajevo. Let’s see what test of strength this destination holds for our athletes. And what fantastic athletes are here again in Stage 12 of the SCL World Series. The strongman champions league Bosnia is another iconic Strongman event with the return of Rongo Keen from Australia and Portugal winner 2022 George Sulaiman.

programme.title: Strongman Champions League
programme.sub-title: S08 : E13 SCL 2022 Season 8, Episode 13, Romania
programme.desc: Welcome to Sibiu in Romania. It’s an important day for some of these athletes, because four of them have a real chance of getting into our all-exclusive world finals. There’s only one more stage after this to get those all-important extra points. So, there’s going to be some fireworks, who will take the title here and who will qualify for the World Finals?

programme.title: Strongman Champions League
programme.sub-title: S08 : E14 SCL 2022 Season 8, Episode 14, Gibraltar
programme.desc: This is it the last show before the world final. These guys have really got to fight for the points now, this is going to be action packed, whilst these guys fight it out all day.

programme.title: Strongman Champions League
programme.sub-title: S08 : E15 SCL 2022 Season 8, Episode 15, Turkey Part 1
programme.desc: We are in Alanya, on Turkey’s south-coast for the final stop at the end of a mammoth season of Strongman Champions League. Here in the sunshine, we’ll finally crown our world champion and what a place Alanya is. You could not ask for a better setting. After months of hard-work, if not years for some of these lads, we find out who will take the world title.

programme.title: Strongman Champions League
programme.sub-title: S08 : E16 SCL 2022 Season 8, Episode 16, Turkey Part 1
programme.desc: Welcome, to day two of the strongman champions league 2022 finals here in Alanya, Turkey. It’s all up for grabs now, everyone is fighting for the world title belt. This is an epic episode where we finally crown the World champion of 2022.

programme.title: Strongman Champions League
programme.sub-title: S09 : E01 SCL 2023 Season 9, Stage 1 - Finland
programme.desc: Welcome to the 2023 Strongman Champions League in Vaasa, Finland! This year’s event introduces a knockout format with 6 intense events over 90 minutes, ending in a unique deadlift face-off with boats.

programme.title: Strongman Champions League
programme.sub-title: S09 : E02 SCL 2023 Season 9, Stage 2 - Serbia
programme.desc: Stage 2 of the Strongman Champions League 2023 is set in Zrenjanin, Serbia. This exciting event features 5 challenging contests, including a superhuman Yoke race. As the SCL World Series Tour continues, athletes will battle it out to claim the yellow leader’s position for the season. Don’t miss this incredible stage of strength and endurance!

programme.title: Strongman Champions League
programme.sub-title: S09 : E03 SCL 2023 Season 9, Stage 3 - Finland Teams World
programme.desc: The World’s Strongest Team will be crowned in this edition of SCL, here in Kalajoki-Finland we’ve picked some of the best in the business, teamed them up, and they’ll be going all out against each other. It’s now no longer about being a lonely wolf, but more about the pack mentality. It is a competition over 7 events, including a Big 2-man Log lift and heavy deadlift. Let’s start the action.

programme.title: Strongman Champions League
programme.sub-title: S09 : E04 SCL 2023 Season 9, Stage 4 - Holland
programme.desc: Strongman Champions League in Holland at the Dru Factory in ULFT. A great location for a spectacular battle with 14 Athletes over 3 events! The first 3 events in this episode are Truckpull/ Superyoke and Farmerswalk, with 2 massive logs of 150 kg in their hands. So, join us for the show of strength, the place of power, it’s the circus of the extreme.

programme.title: Strongman Champions League
programme.sub-title: S09 : E05 SCL 2023 Season 9, Stage 5 - Holland 2023
programme.desc: Ladies and gentleman, boys and girls, strongman fans across the world, we are back for SCL Holland part two. Get ready because it’s about to get heavy. The Strongman Champions League in Holland, continues with the last 3 events, here at the Dru Factory in ULFT. The events in this episode are the Viking Press, Wheel Flip and the Atlas Stones, with 180 kg in the end.

programme.title: Strongman Champions League
programme.sub-title: S09 : E06 SCL 2023 Season 9, Stage 6 - World's Strongest Latino
programme.desc: For the first time ever, the World’s Strongest Latino competition has begun. This two-day event in Porto, Portugal, features 20 athletes from around the world competing in 8 events. After 4 grueling events, the top 12 will advance to the finals.

programme.title: Strongman Champions League
programme.sub-title: S09 : E07 SCL 2023 Season 9, Stage 7 - Finland World Record Breakers
programme.desc: Strongman Champions League World Record Breakers 2023 starts with a 25-ton snow plow! Crazy machines are pulled and pushed, with many kilograms moved. A few new world records are set in this competition.

programme.title: Strongman Champions League
programme.sub-title: S09 : E08 SCL 2023 Season 9, Stage 8 - Portugal
programme.desc: We have returned to the powerhouse of Portugal for an edge-of-your-seat galactic battle. If all the planets collided at once, it wouldn’t compare to the bang of this show. Get ready for the battle of the beasts; it’s the heaviest show in the universe, the Strongman Champions League.

programme.title: Strongman Champions League
programme.sub-title: S09 : E09 SCL 2023 Season 9, Stage 9 - England
programme.desc: SCL UK has landed in Gloucester it is workout war fitness for the ferocious, it’s going to be a a battle of the brutal, a rampage of the roofless. This is going to be a massacre of the muscles. You know it by now, but just in case you don’t, this is strongman champions league.

programme.title: Strongman Champions League
programme.sub-title: S09 : E10 SCL 2023 Season 9, Stage 10 - World's Strongest Viking
programme.desc: On the menu this week it’s medieval madness, we’ve come back to the middle ages to test our noble men through a muscle gaining of events. They are hoping and we are hoping that one will survive to take the title of the world’s strongest Viking. The official World's Strongest Viking is this time in Finland.

programme.title: Strongman Champions League
programme.desc: This week is a good one, can you feel the energy? Sit still, just look at me and try and feel the energy, because I can tell you, the atmosphere here is electric, it’s explosive, there is a pure elemental force going through these athletes' veins. I’m shaking because it’s Poland, it’s powerful, it’s strongman champions league, and you know what I'm going to say, get ready because it’s about to get heavy.

programme.title: Strongman Champions League
programme.desc: SCL Poland part 2 - Who will win the title in Poland and take 25 points for the world ranking. It is very exciting on the top, in part 1 between Poland and Latvia. Another great episode with super strongman events such as: Bag Toss Medley, Log Lift Reps and the Powerstairs. Also an interview with Mateusz Kieloszkowski, the all time favorite champion from Poland.

programme.title: Strongman Champions League
programme.desc: It’s time to show our strength and gain respect from the gods of Olympus. Our gladiators have many events set out by no other than Hercules himself. The coliseum is ready here on this mythological island of Cyprus, so we have landed in Limassol were again 12 Top Strongmen are battling for the title and ranking points.

programme.title: Strongman Champions League
programme.sub-title: S09 : E14 SCL 2023 Season 9, Stage 14 - South Africa
programme.desc: The only and official world championship Truckpulling for its 10th year, again at the Strongman Champions league. With the 3 times Worldchampion Kelvin de Ruiter – defending his title. This championship has trucks in all shapes and sizes which is a lot like our athletes, there all different pay loads, but does the biggest win or is it the strongest.

programme.title: Strongman Champions League
programme.sub-title: S09 : E15 Stage 15 - SCL World Finals Bosnia
programme.desc: Years and years of determination has brought us here today, when all the walls felt like they were caving in perseverance. When their bodies were screaming, hurting, shouting stop, beneath. These are the things which make up a man, these are the things that bring you world finalists. This episode they fight for the greatest title of all, they fight to put their names in the history books forever.

programme.title: Strongman Champions League
programme.sub-title: S09 : E16 Stage 16 - SCL World Finals Bosnia
programme.desc: Part 2 of the World Finals of the Strongman Champions League tour 2023 at the Sarajevo Centar Skenderija in Bosnia. 3 Events was done already and amazing results have been set. Who will be the new World champion? Find out here, who, after 16 stages, will be crowned World Champion 2023.

programme.desc: GLORY 100 features four GLORY world title bouts, four separate four-man one-night tournaments to determine who qualifies for the Last Heavyweight Standing finals, and several key matchups involving some of GLORY’s most popular fighters.

programme.title: GLORY Kickboxing
